fields.name: IdentifierUri
fields.description: Indicates the identifier uri for aad auth.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the webhook receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

fields.name: ObjectId
fields.description: Indicates the webhook app object Id for aad auth.

fields.name: ServiceUri
fields.description: The URI where webhooks should be sent.

fields.name: TenantId
fields.description: Indicates the tenant id for aad auth.

fields.name: UseAadAuth
fields.description: Indicates whether or not use AAD authentication.

fields.name: UseCommonAlertSchema
fields.description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.
